verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H3068>Jehova<s%> is my <S%H216>light<s%> and my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>; Whom shall I <S%H3372>fear<s%>? <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is the <S%H4581>strength<s%> of my <S%H2416>life<s%>; Of whom shall I be <S%H6342>afraid<s%>?

When <S%H7489>evil-doers<s%> <S%H7126>came<s%> upon me to eat <S%H398>up<s%> my <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, Even mine <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> and my <S%H341>foes<s%>, they <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%>.

Though a <S%H4264>host<s%> should <S%H2583>encamp<s%> against <S%H3820>me<s%>, My heart shall not <S%H3372>fear<s%>: Though <S%H4421>war<s%> should <S%H6965>rise<s%> against <S%H982>me<s%>, Even then will I be confident.

One <S%H259><s%> thing have I <S%H7592>asked<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that will I <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3427>after<s%>; That I may dwell in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of my <S%H2416>life<s%>, To <S%H2372>behold<s%> the <S%H5278>beauty<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And to <S%H1239>inquire<s%> in his <S%H1964>temple<s%>.

For in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>trouble<s%> he will keep me <S%H6845>secretly<s%> in his <S%H5520>pavilion<s%>: In the <S%H5643>covert<s%> of his <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> will he <S%H5641>hide<s%> <S%H7311>me<s%>; He will lift me up upon a <S%H6697>rock<s%>.

And now shall my <S%H7218>head<s%> be lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> above mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H2076>me<s%>. And I will offer in his <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H8643>joy<s%>; I will <S%H7891>sing<s%>, <S%H2167>yea<s%>, I will sing praises unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, when I <S%H7121>cry<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice<s%>: Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> also upon <S%H6030>me<s%>, and answer me.
When thou <S%H1245>saidst<s%>, Seek ye my <S%H6440>face<s%>; My <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6440>thee<s%>, Thy face, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, will I <S%H1245>seek<s%>.

Hide <S%H5641><s%> not thy <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H5186>me<s%>; Put not thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5186>away<s%> in <S%H639>anger<s%>: Thou hast been my <S%H5833>help<s%>; <S%H5203>Cast<s%> me not <S%H5800>off<s%>, neither forsake <S%H430>me<s%>, O God of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>.
When my <S%H1>father<s%> and my <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, Then Jehovah will take me <S%H622>up<s%>.
Teach <S%H3384><s%> me thy <S%H1870>way<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; And <S%H5148>lead<s%> me in a <S%H4334>plain<s%> <S%H734>path<s%>, Because of mine <S%H8324>enemies<s%>.

Deliver <S%H5414><s%> me not over unto the <S%H5315>will<s%> of mine <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>: For <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> are risen <S%H6965>up<s%> against <S%H3307>me<s%>, And such as breathe out <S%H2555>cruelty<s%>.
I had <S%H3884>fainted<s%>, unless I had <S%H539>believed<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2898>goodness<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> In the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>.
Wait <S%H6960><s%> for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: Be <S%H553>strong<s%>, And let thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> take <S%H2388>courage<s%>; <S%H6960>Yea<s%>, wait thou for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
